text: The 1924–25 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team represents Loyola University Chicago during the 1924–25 NCAA men's basketball season. The ramblers were led by second-year head coach Leonard Sachs. The team had finished the season with an overall record of 4–11. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Loyola Ramblers men's basketball seasons Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers
title: 1924–25 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team
